text: Saluri Rajeswara Rao ( Telugu : Saluru Rajeswara Rao) (11 October 1922 â€“ 25 October 1999) was an Indian composer, conductor, singer, lyricist, actor and musician. He has mostly worked in South Indian movies.M. L. Narasimham, "Trend-setter in Light Music". The Hindu, 12 March 1993. Retrieved 2011-03-25. He had made music for over 50 years and was known as a very good composer. == Movies == Year Film Language Director Banner Notes 1935 Sri Krishna Leelalu Telugu Ch. Prakash Rao Maheeja Films 1984 Adarsavanthudu Telugu Kodi Ramakrishna Maheeja Films 1986 Tandra Paparayudu Telugu Dasari Narayana Rao Annapurna Studios & Padmalaya Studios == Awards and honours == * Andhra University awarded him a Ph.D * Appointed as Asthan Vidhuvan of Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanam * Kalaimamani award from Tamil Nadu Art, Music and Drama Forum * 1992 Raghupathi Venkaiah Award for his work in Telugu film fndustryBiography at IMDB * 1980 Nandi Award for music in Sri Vasavi Kanyaka Parameshwari Mahatmyam.http://ipr.ap.nic.in/New_Links/Film.pdf == References == Category:1999 deaths Category:1922 births Category:Indian composers
